nodes.text: Laz was one of four continents on the planet of Lazerian IV.

It was located mostly on the planet's western hemisphere and contained the capital Lazeria City as well as Devit and Dorynn and an Old Jedi outpost. The terrain was mostly made up of plains, with a large mountain range along the western coast. Together with Elgar and Torm, it made up the Kingdom of Devit.
